dialogue.text: Did you know that derivatives are literally everywhere in your daily life? Every time something changes, calculus is happening!
What do you mean? I thought derivatives were just those horrible equations from math class that I'd never use!
Think about it! When you're driving and hit the brakes, the derivative of your position is your velocity, and the derivative of velocity is acceleration!
Oh wow! So my car's speedometer is basically showing me a derivative in real time? That's actually pretty cool!
Exactly! And your phone's GPS? It's constantly calculating derivatives to predict your arrival time based on how your position changes.
This is blowing my mind! So calculus isn't just abstract math, it's literally powering the technology I use every single day!
